SEARCH
Package src.controller

Class MedicineController

java.lang.Object
src.controller.MedicineController
public class MedicineController extends Object
Controller class that manages medicine and pharmacy operations including inventory management and medication dispensing. This class serves as the main interface between the pharmacy system and medicine data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new MedicineController with the specified repositories.

    • MedicineController

      public MedicineController(IMedicineRepository medicineRepo, IMedicalRecordRepository medicalRecordRepo, IAppointmentRepository appointmentRepo)
      Constructs a new MedicineController with the specified repositories. Initializes the controller and loads existing medications.
      Parameters:
      medicineRepo - Repository for managing medicine inventory
      medicalRecordRepo - Repository for managing medical records
      appointmentRepo - Repository for managing appointments

      stock - Initial stock quantity
      lowStockAlert - Threshold for low stock warning
